definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
to refract/refraction/to reflect (in the figurative sense: to show the nature of)
to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
to reflect/reflection (from a mirror etc)/reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)

sentences.english: And to accept that - to quote him - "it shoots, it hits".
sentences.chinese: 引用作者的话，便是，箭在射，箭打中了靶心。

sentences.english: It never looses its importance in our life.
sentences.chinese: 它从来射向我们生活的重要性。

sentences.english: Ron Artest likes basketball because he gets to shoot around.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰喜欢篮球由于他喜欢随便射的感觉。

sentences.english: but what is primitive is not to be shot out into the night and the dark.
sentences.chinese: 而那原初的事物并不会射向夜晚和黑暗。

sentences.english: The boy discharged a stone from a sling .
sentences.chinese: 那男孩用弹弓射了一粒石子。

sentences.english: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.chinese: 这些火枪的先驱者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齐射。

sentences.english: The rifle recoils when it is fired.
sentences.chinese: 步枪射出子弹后要反冲一下。

sentences.english: The injection weight, injection rate and plasticizing capacity change according to the model and kind of the material.
sentences.chinese: 射出量，注射率及塑化能量依材料类别及模型而改变。

sentences.english: What if he gets the sword and stops hitting the bull's-eye?
sentences.chinese: 怕的是得到了宝剑，就射不中靶心了。

sentences.english: He put some of his sperm in a syringe and gave it to Piper.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己的精子射在一支注射器里交给Piper。

sentences.english: Envy shoots at others and wounds himself.
sentences.chinese: 妒忌心射向别人，受伤的却是自己。

sentences.english: The larger graticule is fixed and indicates the direction in which the guns are pointing.
sentences.chinese: 大的那个是固定的，它指示武器的射向。

sentences.english: He Xiachu a cold sweat, and quickly bow Dajian, the targeting of tiger shooting.
sentences.chinese: 他吓出一身冷汗，赶紧拉弓搭箭，对准老虎就射。

sentences.english: Flashlights shot streaks of gleam up and down at the walls.
sentences.chinese: 手电筒射出一道道光束，在墙上晃动。

sentences.english: A thoroughly entertaining half ended with Kakà volleying wide from just inside the area.
sentences.chinese: 令人兴奋的上半场以卡卡的禁区内近射偏出而结束。

sentences.english: Three aircraft were shot down by surface-to-air missiles.
sentences.chinese: 三架飞机被地对空导弹射了下来。

definition: arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
to catapult/to launch/to eject (from a plane)/to shoot
to rake with machine gunfire/to strafe/to machine-gun down
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
to penetrate/to pierce/to see clearly/to have an insight into
